issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Is not a bug in our product
resolution.name: Not Our Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
When I wanted to show a Superscript Minus Sign it works for iOS using \u207B in Label and the same is not working for Android.

Related links I found http://code.google.com/p/android/issues/detail?id=10135
fields.summary: Superscript Minus Sign Android not able to show

comments.body:
Hello,

Based on the link you provided, the problem seems related to Android itself, and not Titanium. You can re-open this issue, if you want to provide any further question or information about the problem.
